React Native: Relationship App Setup
desc2: I completed the full setup of a Relationship App in React Native. Designed the UI with multiple screens, explored components, navigation, state management, and layouts. Made the layout responsive and implemented basic navigation.

title: Angular: Full Project Setup
desc2: I completed the full project setup in Angular. Learned how components, modules, and services work. Generated the project using Angular CLI, understood the folder structure, and wrote basic component code. Explored routing, data binding, and template syntax during the setup.
